name: Id (patricemp, rionbrodie)
description:
Godot Wild Jam #23 submission

Theme: Tiny World

In this game, you connect into the mind of an astronaut on an alien planet. Some things have gone wrong, and by finding notes you can start to piece together the puzzle. Or you can just do nothing and see how the astronaut copes.

All words you type enter into the astronaut's stream of consciousness, and like all thoughts, they may or may not act on them. Try to figure out how to best influence the astronaut to escape from his tiny world of reality tv and potatoes.

With some minor exceptions, all work was created during the jam time.

Leads Rion Brodie and Patrice Metcalf-Putnam

  • Most code by Patrice Metcalf-Putnam: https://twitter.com/applesauce2u
  • Concept and 3D art by Rion Brodie: http://instagram.com/rionbrodie
  • Music by: https://itch.io/profile/chimeramusic
  • TV and animal sound design by: https://gorrgolem.itch.io/
  • Astronaut character design by: https://dunkelgrau.itch.io/
  • Alien character design by: https://pipoya.itch.io/ (only art not created during jam)
  • All other pixel art by Juan Rodriguez (including the most incredible alien bird that we were not able to incorporate at the last minute) https://juanlrodriguesz.itch.io/
  • Special thanks to Amy Peters on story consultation and writing contributions!

Github: https://github.com/rionhunter/GMTKjam
